Articles.Content:
I have just started making a mod involving a gasoline engine to generate electricity for rover wheels. I need some help.

as you can see the stock jet engine exhaust isn't working.

also the thing with electric charge.

If anyone can help it would be appreciated.

some creations that don't completely work.

Fuel truck thing

it would look good on a train. hmmmm.....

Edited August 2, 2013 by duncan1297
I don't really no about the exhaust, maybe switch to the RCS or Mini-flame ones. For electricity, you have to have the part consume a NEGATIVE amount, not add a positive amount.
I figured out that giving the engine zero thrust doesn't work but giving it .1 seems to fix it.
OK, now I'm confused. after using the part on something then returning to the sph it no longer shows up in the part menu.

You probably have almost no comments due to your lack of information....

What exactly are you trying to do? What have you tried so far, including Unity setup and config code your using?

Your OP really explains nothing at all, and the screenshots do no good without the proper information.

Honestly all I gather is your trying to burn fuel and make electric change, kinda hard to give advice on that alone.
